title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct average velocity = 5

avg .   vel . = x ( 3 ) − x ( 0 ) 3 − 0

= 18 − 3 3 = 5

1 point is earned for correctly setting v(t) equal to student's average velocity OR from student's x(t)
